topics.body:
I just watched a documentary on marketing towards teens. From it I inadvertantly learned about Juggalos.

Here I believed they were like the Sonic fandom and just a bunch of people others found a bit annoying.

I was so wrong.

Granted, I'm sure not all of them are the "the middle fingers are for those who don't understand us. Fuck the world. We don't care what you think" kind of guys that got on camera and are just dudes who like the music. They're still people after all, not some hivemind.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"the middle fingers are for those who don't understand us. Fuck the world. We don't care what you think"[/bq]
No; you pretty much hit the nail on the head.

topics.body:
So after working out for a while, I've discovered I'm definitely getting stronger. I'm much better than when I began.
Only issues is that the growth is mainly in the arms. The legs and stomach show no real change, though if I suck my stomach in, it definitely seems more defined.

[spoiler]blog over[/spoiler]

topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53dfc8fe6368722a19320100#post_53dfc8fe6368722a19320100

But I don't have to wake up at 5 am to catch the bus!

No more Spongebob.

No more stress due to 3 exams pinned in a row on the same day!

No more Spongebob!

I no longer have to struggle to keep myself awaken 6 hours a day!

No more Spongebob!!

NO MORE ESSAYS ABOUT SUBJECTS YOU'LL NEVER APPLY ON YOUR EVERY DAY JOB!!!

NO MORE SPONGEBOB!!

NO MORE SPONGEBOB!!

NO MORE SPONGEBOB!!

*Insane laughter here*

If you don't know who this is he's the original writer and director of spongebob and after the first movie he resigned.
